projects.name: Summz-AI Summarizer
projects.description: Summary Generation: Users can input the URL of a lengthy article, and the web app utilizes AI to provide a concise summary of the article content. History Saving with Local Storage: Allowing users to save summaries locally, providing a convenient way to revisit and manage their reading history. Copy to Clipboard Functionality: Enables users to easily share or store the summarized content by copying it to their clipboard. Advanced RTK Query API Requests: Utilizes the advanced capabilities of Redux Toolkit (RTK) Query for making API requests.

projects.name: BitSavvy- cryptocurrency app
projects.description: Developed a Crypto web application with State Management using Redux Toolkit, UI Creation using Ant Design, creating charts using Chart.js, fetching data from multiple sources using RapidAPI and React as the frontend. Visualized data to show the real-time prices, and market trends, daily changes. Top 100 cryptocurrencies, filter by search, insights: in-depth data and trends and latest news.

projects.name: E-commerce Website
projects.description: It involves designing and developing a platform that allows customers to purchase products online. The website has a user-friendly interface, a product catalog, search and filter capabilities, a secure payment gateway, and order management functionalities.

experiences.description: Developed a React.js web page featuring interactive Chart.js visuals to showcase the companys new loan offerings. Developed a Django-based web application to collect user details and manage database processes for a company dashboard.

full_output.name: Sanchi Kataria
achievements_and_awards: Earned recognition twice on the Deans List: Excellence in Academics for outstanding academic performance in 2023 and 2024.
Achieved First place in the ACM Mini Hacks hackathon for building a platform for carbon emission and carbon credits.
Received Elite certificate in Design and Analysis of Algorithms course on NPTEL by IIT Madras.
Secured a place in top 10% in the IT Branch.
Ranked in top 200k on leetcode, 5+ badges on Leetcode.
